description.zh: 一个对话式语音代理系统，可根据用户的位置、兴趣和游览时长生成个性化的自助语音导览。系统采用多智能体架构，包含历史、建筑、文化和美食等专业AI代理。通过先进的文本转语音技术，输出富有表现力且自然的语音内容。
description.en: A conversational voice agent system that creates personalized, self-guided audio tours based on user location, interests, and preferred tour duration. It leverages a multi-agent architecture with specialized AI agents for history, architecture, culture, and cuisine. The system generates expressive, natural-sounding speech output using advanced TTS technology.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供高度个性化且沉浸式的语音导览体验
- 结合实时信息检索与富有表现力的语音合成，增强内容吸引力
- 模块化的多智能体设计，支持可扩展和易维护的AI叙事架构

## 功能列表:

- 使用协调代理管理导览流程并调度各专家代理
- 配备具有不同语调的历史、建筑、文化与美食专业代理
- 基于用户输入位置动态生成内容
- 集成实时网络搜索以获取最新信息
- 支持自定义导览时长（15、30 或 60 分钟）
- 根据用户兴趣权重自适应分配时间
- 使用 Gpt-4o Mini Audio 生成高质量语音输出
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Delivers highly personalized and immersive audio tour experiences
- Combines real-time information retrieval with expressive voice synthesis for engaging content
- Modular multi-agent design enables scalable and maintainable AI-driven storytelling

## Features:

- Orchestrator Agent to manage tour flow and coordinate expert agents
- Specialized agents: History, Architecture, Culture, and Culinary Agents with distinct tones
- Dynamic content generation based on user-provided location
- Real-time web search integration for up-to-date information
- Support for customizable tour durations (15, 30, or 60 minutes)
- Adaptive time allocation based on user interest weights
- High-quality audio output using Gpt-4o Mini Audio
